articles.description: The media watchdog is prioritising cases involving COVID-19 in a bid to stop the spread of misinformation during the pandemic.

articles.author: Zoe Forsey
articles.title: Kate Middleton and William's sweet birthday message to Queen as she turns 94 - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Queen isn't allowed to see her grandson Prince William and his wife Kate Middleton today due to the coronavirus pandemic, but that hasn't stopped them from wishing her a happy 94th birthday
articles.content:
The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge have taken to social media to wish the Queen a happy 94th birthday.
 The couple shared a photo of themselves with the Monarch on the official Kensington Palace Twitter account with a sweet message. 
They wrote: "Wishing Her… [+1796 chars]

articles.author: Olivia Petter
articles.title: Eminem celebrates 12 years of sobriety: 'Clean dozen, in the books!' - The Independent
articles.description: ‘I’m not afraid,’ tweets rapper
articles.content:
Eminem has marked 12 years of sobriety by sharing a photograph of a coin noting the milestone that reads: One day at a time.
Writing on Twitter on Tuesday, the 47-year-old rapper said: Clean dozen, in the books! Im not afraid.
Eminem, whose real name is Mar… [+1649 chars]

articles.author: Priya Elan
articles.title: London fashion week to go online-only as lockdown endures - The Guardian
articles.description: Womenswear and menswear shows to be merged for event featuring digital showrooms
articles.content:
The next London fashion week is going to be held entirely digitally, and will merge its womenswear and menswear shows, its organisers have announced.
The event in June will feature a multimedia rollout to include interviews, podcasts and digital showrooms th… [+2918 chars]

articles.title: Phillip Schofield at London flat after leaving £2m family home - Daily Mail
articles.description: Phillip Schofield was seen arriving at his new central London flat on Monday - having recently moved out of his £2million family home following the announcement that he is gay.
articles.content:
Phillip Schofield was seen arriving at his new central London flat on Monday - having recently moved out of his £2million family home following the announcement that he is gay.

articles.title: The Batman Joins The List Of Movies Being Delayed By Coronavirus - Empire
articles.description: Sopranos prequel The Many Saints Of Newark, and more are on the move. Get the details at Empire.
articles.content: Thanks to the sheer number of movies being delayed because of the coronavirus pandemic and related cinema closures, even movies that seemed to be safely anchored in 2021 release spots are now being shifted as studios alter their plans. The latest high-profile… [+1382 chars]

articles.author: Luke Hawker
articles.title: Prince Charles gives hidden nod to bride he walked down the isle in latest video - Express
articles.description: PRINCE CHARLES gave a subtle nod to a special bride he walked down the isle during a video message to open a temporary coronavirus field hospital in Wales.

articles.author: Laura O'Callaghan
articles.title: Kate pens heartfelt letter to 'inspiring' staff and volunteers at children's hospital - Express
articles.description: KATE, the Duchess of Cambridge, has written a heartfelt letter to a children's hospital thanking its 'truly inspiring' staff for caring for youngsters as well as adult coronavirus patients during the pandemic.
